ðŸ“– Summary: GOWA is a WhatsApp REST API built with Golang, designed for efficient memory usage. It supports UI, Webhooks, and MCP (Model Context Protocol), enabling integration with AI agents and tools. The project provides a comprehensive solution for sending WhatsApp messages, managing statuses, and receiving messages with webhook notifications.
